data.text: @goldentamago Hi, 『DONI』~ドニー~. How can we help?
@samanthatancdeo We've sent you a dm, Samantha. Kindly check.
@samanthatancdeo Oops, we've tried sending you a dm but we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings.
@samanthatancdeo We're truly sorry if we've made you feel this way, Samantha. We'll send you a dm so we can ask for your details.
@implim Hi, I.P. We're sorry to hear this. We'll send you a dm so we can ask for your details.
@misisniAgli Hi, Charisse. Our apologies for the inconvenience. May we know if you have also reported this to any of our lounge representatives?
@itsmeChefPaul We're truly sorry to hear this, @itsmeChefPaul. We have already reached out to the passenger so we can look into this. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.
@samanthatancdeo Hi, Samantha. We're truly sorry to hear this. May we know if you have reported this to any of our inflight crew?
@Saurin2344 Thank you as well for taking the time to report this to us, Saurin.
@jjcoupdefoudre Got this!
@Saurin2344 Our sincerest apologies for this, Saurin. As checked, the said flight has already departed at 8:16 am.
@Saurin2344 Noted, Saurin. May we know if you were assisted already?

@Saurin2344 Hi, Saurin. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused. May we know your flight number and date so we can have your feedback forwarded to the office concerned for their attention and service enhancement?
@ShoeChefAA Hi, AA. We are sorry to hear this. We have sent you a DM to further assist you. Please check. Thank you.
@amime08 Hi, Maria. We have sent you a DM. Kindly check your inbox. Thank you.

@jhenparado @Idolraffyishere Hi, mstcher. We understand your sentiments and we're truly sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused. However, we can only reiterate that your issuing agent is in the best position to assist you on your concern. Please coordinate with them directly for updates.

@JoopsMiranda This is noted. As checked, there is an available flight on that date. May we suggest to clear your browsing history or try to use a different browser, important alive @JoopsMiranda. Thank you.
@JoopsMiranda We're sorry about this. May we know the chosen the travel dates?
@scottuamg We have sent another follow-up request to the office concerned, Scott. We're sorry for the processing time this has taken.

@jmdeeeeeee We're truly sorry for the inconvenience, JM. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. Please note that our flight schedules are highly subject to change for reasons beyond our control. We hope for your understanding. Thank you.

@Rbinatilyo Hello Akoy isang Pinoy
@Rbinatilyo. May we suggest to clear your browsing history or try to use a different browser.
@JoopsMiranda Hi! You can now book your flight on our website. Baguio-Cebu and v.v. flights will operate starting December 16, 2022.
@calbinok We're sorry to hear about your experience, DEA. We'll forward your feedback to our handling team for service enhancements. Thank you.
@jmdeeeeeee We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the flight delay, JM. Kindly approach our airport personnel for immediate assistance. Thank you.
@bhiatchybhiatch We've responded to your DM. Kindly check. Thank you.
@antulam Hi, Antu! We've responded to your DM. Kindly check.
@GaryValenciano1 Thank you for choosing to fly with us, Mr. Gary Valenciano! Stay safe always and we hope to see you again onboard! ❤

@bart1105 Hi, Bert. We regret to learn of your seat concern. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you on this? Thank you.
@heydannixx Hi, Danni. We have sent a response to your DM. Thank you.
@thelonehapi2002 Hi, Thelonehapi2003. We regret to learn of your concern. Please let us know how we can assist you in this regard. Thank you.

@hisuka41 Hi, Andzc. As of the moment, we still do not have advisories regarding the resumption of our Auckland flights. Kindly continue checking our website and social media channels for updates. Thank you. ✈
@kathleenlgo We have sent you a DM to assist you with your concern, Kathleen. Thank you.
@kathleenlgo Hi, Kathleen. We're sorry to hear this. We highly suggest to approach any PAL representative for immediate assistance. We highly appreciate your patience at this time. Thank you.
@rubensupan Hello, Ruben. We're sorry to hear this. May we know where did you book your flight?
@davidlitz Hello, David. If your upgrade is successful, you will be notified by email at least 24 hours prior flight departure.
@hatedtosay We have replied to your DM.
@bhiatchybhiatch Thank you for letting us know. :)

@charlieclarion Hi, Charlie. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website and mobile application. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser. Thank you.
@mckv24 Hi, Krystal. We apologize for this. Please be advised that we are currently awaiting your response. Thank you.
@bhiatchybhiatch We have sent you a DM to assist you with your rebooking, Bhiatchybhiatch. Thank you.
@bhiatchybhiatch Hi, @bhiatchybhiatch. May we know if you are booked directly with us?
@yolobaclig We've responded to your DM. Kindly check.
@scottuamg We've responded to your DM. Kindly check.
@seki_ikat Hi, KWATSU. Yes, you may put these items in your carry-on.
@scottuamg Hi, Scott. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We have sent you a DM to further assist you with your concern. Kindly check. Thank you.
@TheAngelaKo Hi, Angela. We have sent you a DM to assist you with your concern. Thank you.

urls.title: Senior Citizen and PWD
urls.description: Services and amenities we offer for Senior Citizens and PWDs

data.text: @RICHARDSAQUINO1 Hi, Richard. The PWD passenger may bring a powered wheelchair as checked baggage and will not be counted as part of the free baggage allowance. Please remind the passenger to bring his/her PWD ID. For more information, please click this link: https://t.co/qVs0Y58zK6. Thank you.

@hydromach Hi, Andrew. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser. Thank you.
@roswald23 Hi, Roswald. We have sent you a DM for assistance regarding your concern. Thank you.
@jessicaimmanuel Hello, J. We have responded to your DM.
@mariellefries Hello, Marielle. We're sorry for this. May we know the error prompt?
@kaiyeah_ Hi, Kai. We regret to learn of your concern. Please allow us to look into this. We have sent a response to your DM. Thank you.
@bossingbigben Hi, Ben. @PALMabuhayMiles will be ready to assist you with your Mabuhay Miles concern. Thank you.
@JeffSantiago_28 Hi, Fritz. Nag reply na po kami sa inyong DM. Salamat.
@magssalvador @PALMabuhayMiles We're glad to hear this, mags! Thank you as well :)
@ChukFarley We have sent another follow-up request to the office concerned, Chuk. We'll send you a message as soon as we have news.
@joyceraguila Hi, Joyce. We regret to learn of your left behind item. We have sent you a DM to assist you on this. Thank you.
@magssalvador Hi, Mags. @PALMabuhayMiles will be ready to assist you with your Mabuhay Miles concern. Thank you.
@leftspaced Hi, Mindy. We apologize, as our offices are under immense volume of requests. We would appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard. Thank you.
@brenyf1 @SegundaAire Hi, brenyf.  We've responded to your DM. Kindly check.
@bonchocobonbon Hello, Bon. We have sent you a DM for assistance regarding your concern.
@ChukFarley We're sorry for this, Chuk. We are coordinating with the office concerned about this. We will message you once we have an update.
@TheAngelaKo Hi, Angela. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you.
@saleh_B99 Hi, Saleh. We have sent a response to your DM. Thank you.
@breadinlocker Hi, Hyunnie. We have sent you a DM to assist you with your request. Thank you.
@DT4Info We have sent a response to your DM, DT. Thank you.
@DT4Info Hi, DT. May we suggest trying another flight schedule or date for your booking. Please let us know if you need further assistance. Thank you.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @LilyBugan Kindly try using the credit card option and indicate your debit card details, Lily.

urls.title: Global Reservation Hotline
urls.description: For bookings made outside Philippine Airlines' website, ticket offices, or hotline, please contact your travel agent directly. For new bookings, rebookings, and other urgent concerns, please call our reservations hotline or chat with us using our non-voice channels.

data.text:
@LilyBugan Kindly try dialing 0919-056-2255, Lily. You may also refer to the link below for the list of our hotlines and ticket office. 

https://t.co/YgcLYDAiC0
@chefedward We're sorry to hear this, Edward. :( We'll send you a dm to ask for your details.
@ChukFarley We're truly sorry for this, Chuk. We have responded to your dm.
@luvjordior We've replied, @luvjordior. :)
@RomeJuanatas We've responded to your dm, @RomeJuanatas. Kindly check.

@LilyBugan Noted, Lily. May we confirm if you are in the Philippines? 

Also, Gcash and debit cards are accepted modes of payment for our website and app.
@LilyBugan Hi, Lily. We're sorry to hear this. May we clarify if you are unable to hear a voice prompt?
@jjcoupdefoudre You're welcome!
@ivanxd We're truly sorry to hear this, Ivan. We assure you that we wouldn't have any changes on your flight unless it was deemed necessary. We'll send you a dm so we can look into this.
@raefication Hi, Rae. We are sorry to hear this. May we know if you are still at the airport? Kindly approach any PAL representative for immediate assistance. Thank you.
@mn_joyride We are sorry to hear this, Joy. May we know your concern so we can assist you?
@jennetsooluengo Got this, Jennet. Thank you.

urls.title: Philippine Airlines
urls.description: Fly confidently with Philippine Airlines' signature heartfelt service at affordable fares

data.text: @netmnp We have no advisory regarding this yet. Kindly check our website https://t.co/ePCV247Zu7, or follow our social media accounts, so that you'll be updated the moment we release advisories on new developments.
@sajinstanlys We are sorry to learn about what happened, SAJIN. We'll have this checked with the concerned office. Kindly wait for an update.
@sajinstanlys We regret to learn this, Sajin. May we request that you change your settings so we can send you a direct message?
@jean_candelaria May we suggest that you try using our website? Please let us know if this works. Thank you.
@poikphilipps We're truly sorry about this, poik. We already requested follow-up. We'll get back to you once we have news. Thank you.
@jean_candelaria Hi, Jean. Our apologies if you are experiencing issues with our mobile app. Have you tried signing up through our website instead?
@i3ilal5 We have sent you a DM to assist you on this. Thank you.
@poikphilipps We are saddened to learn about what happened, poik. To further assist you on this, we sent you a DM. Kindly check your inbox.
@i3ilal5 Hi, Bilal. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. May we kindly request you to adjust your account setting so we can send you a DM and look into this matter further. Thank you.
@jean_candelaria Hi, Jean. We are sorry to hear this. May we ask for the error prompt you encountered?
@AkoSiApolfish Hi, c0uchf|sH. We are sorry to hear this. We sent you a DM to further assist you with your concern. Kindly check your inbox. Thank you.

@thirdmich Hi, Reaj. We are sorry to hear about your disappointment. May we know more details about your concern? May we also request you to adjust your account settings so we could send you a DM. Thank you.
@quengarroyo Hi, Queenie. Kindly put the item in your check-in baggage. Thank you.
@PaulGardon Hi, Paul. May we know the quantity you wish to bring?

@jhenparado @Idolraffyishere Hi, mstcher. We're truly sorry to hear this. We've tried sending you a DM so we can ask for your details but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check so we can look into your concern. Thank you.
@gypsypen Hi, Leah! We've responded to your DM. Kindly check.
@akosipedr0w Hi, akosipedr0w. We're sorry to hear this. We highly suggest to approach any PAL representative for immediate assistance. Thank you.
@tc16838 Hi, TC. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. We have sent you a DM to assist you on this. Thank you.
